attributes.action: Restrict the Actions of the HSE to industrial work only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The HSE is increasingly getting involved in things it shouldn't (ie childrens playgrounds, swimming rings etc)at the expense of MAJOR industrial accidents not being investigated.
this should stop with immediate effect as serious H & S incidents are not been investigated and people are getting maimed for life, while the HSE choose the easy option
